summary:
**Meeting Overview**:  
The Ad Hoc Committee on Legislative Affairs of the City of Dallas will convene on January 15, 2025, at 8:00 AM, both via videoconference and in-person at City Hall. The meeting aims to discuss and make recommendations regarding various legislative items relevant to local governance.

**Key Agenda Items**:  
1. Approval of minutes from the January 6, 2025, meeting.
2. Recommendations for adjusting the status of several legislative items within the state legislative program appendix, including:
   - Movement of “Amend local government election dates and authorize ranked choice voting” from Pursue to Support.
   - Movement of “Enhance safety for residents of senior facilities” from Monitor to Support.
   - Movement of “Support transparency in utility operations and grid reliability” from Support to Monitor.
   - Movement of “Support rail safety legislation” from Support to Monitor.
   - Movement of “Promote proper mental and physical healthcare for all” from Support to Monitor.
   - Movement of “Seek clarity regarding card rooms” from Monitor to Pursue.

**Important Details**:  
The committee will review the implications of these movements on local governance and legislative priorities, particularly focusing on safety, transparency, and healthcare.

**Action Items**:  
The committee will seek approval for the minutes and recommendations to adjust the status of the listed legislative items. Additionally, an executive session may be held to discuss legal or property matters if necessary.
